column1: Inflammation of the Nose due to an Allergy
column2: Louise, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: 25 years of chronic allergies in Florida-have become immune to most medications-tekral is the only one that works-a miracle for me as I get REALLY sick and stay bedridden without it-now pharmacy cannot get it any more-don't know what I'm going to do

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I finaaly found something that works on my 24/7 running nose now I can't get it anywhere. Publix doesn't carry iy, Walgreens doesn't take my insurance (BCBS) and CVS also doesn't carry it.  Does anyone no where to get it?

column2: mlpjlk, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: This is a miracle drug. If I take it at the firt sign of a post nasal drip or sniffle, I am clear with in 30 minutes. I then remain clear for more than a day. I could not make it through spring and summer in Texas without it.

column1: Inflammation of the Nose due to an Allergy
column2: KDO, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: the dry mouth was a big problem as i couldnt drink enough water. but the blurry vision and dizziness was the worst.  I've taken this as directed for about 3 weeks now and just today had the vision/dizzy stuff.  I am feeling out of sorts and weak as a result.

column2: Nite nite, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My allergies are really bad.This is the only medicine worked on my allergies. I thanked my doctor after the first night i slept all night.
I took this pill once and will never use it again. I could not sleep, felt odd/anxious, and had shaky hands.

column2: Sue, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have chronic hayfever that escalates during the spring. Usually I have to miss days at work.  Nothing over the counter brings relief like Tekral for me.  I am grateful that my doctor prescribed this. I have used it for 2 days now and feel great! The doctor also prescribed Omnaris 2x daily along with this.  It is a winning formula for me.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This stuff made me so shaky I could hardly function.  In addition, I was unable to sleep when taken in the dosage prescribed.

column2: unreelmom, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: It was slow to work, had to take it for a few days before I was able to feel any relief

column2: boomersooner666, 25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This medicine is great. Really clears out the nasal passages and I even found some relief for bronchicial symptoms as well.

column2: phutureman, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Very effective in relieving my conjestion and alergy symptoms.  Unfortunately, I experienced most of the listed side effects.  most notably, numbness in my hands, diziness, anxiety, rapid heartbeat, loss of apetite, loss of sex drive, and blured vision in one eye.  I rarely experience side affects from medication.  The effects of caffeine and alcohol were greatly magnifide.

column2: George G., 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: The Tekral worked great on my allergies. I live in San Antonio and every year around this time I suffer from horrible allergies.  My doctor prescribed this for me and it worked better than any thing else I have tried.  I did't eperience any drowsiness either and was able to work all day without any problems.  The drug's info said it was a  12 hour medicine but it lasted for longer than that!
